arts.ttl: Fabian Hurzeler slams Aston Villa incident as Brighton boss says 'it's not acceptable'
arts.sum: “When it continues like this, you see it every weekend the blocking goalkeeper – if the Premier League doesn’t find a clear rule it will end in a different sport. arts.ttl: Worrying Villa trend continues as proven partnership restored after injury blow
arts.sum: On paper, Villa face trickier games at home, with only three matches coming against sides in the bottom half of the away league table. In the 24 league matches Villa played with Mings and Konsa as a pair under Emery in 2022/23, they conceded 23 goals and kept nine clean sheets.

arts.ttl: Brighton fight back to draw with Aston Villa
arts.sum: Brighton equalised less than 10 minutes from time, however, as Joao Pedro teed up Lamptey to drill a low effort past Emiliano Martinez, denting Villa's UEFA Champions League hopes. Villa then took the lead early in the second half as a sublime dinked pass by Watkins put Rogers clean through, and the young Englishman drilled his effort past Bart Verbruggen and into the far corner.

arts.ttl: Villa created enough chances to win - Emery
arts.sum: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery says his side created enough chances to win and played a "fantastic match" after their first goal, following a 2-2 draw against Brighton & Hove Albion.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa star leaves Villa Park on crutches as Unai Emery gives 'worst' injury update
arts.sum: Join our Aston Villa WhatsApp group and get the latest breaking news, interviews and opinion sent straight to your phone, plus matchday team news and live updates of all the action. In his post-match press conference, Emery added: "A metatarsal (injury), it would be the worst news in case it is confirmed tomorrow."

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 'in the race' but Unai Emery can't hide frustration after 2-2 Brighton draw
arts.sum: "We played a very fantastic match more or less only the first 20 minutes we started lower than we were planning and we conceded one goal," Emery said on Sky Sports. arts.ttl: 'Anytime' – Tariq Lamptey sends defiant message after his strike at Aston Villa
arts.sum: Tariq Lamptey gives his verdict after Albion’s 2-2 draw at Aston Villa

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 2-2 Brighton & Hove Albion: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Tariq Lamptey nets late equaliser
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion survive Aston Villa's barrage to come from behind and secure dramatic 2-2 draw at Villa Park in the Premier League on Monday night.

arts.ttl: John Townley's Aston Villa player ratings with scores from 5 to 8
arts.sum: Pau Torres was occupied by Joao Pedro, and with Diego Carlos caught up the pitch, Adingra picked up the pieces in the box and beat Emi Martinez. Aston Villa's three-match winning run at home came to an end after being held to a 2-2 draw with Brighton.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa fail to close gap on top four with draw at home to Brighton
arts.sum: Ollie Watkins and Morgan Rogers were on target for Villa.
